text: tankal mitu vetanai erpatta potellam avarkal"musave! Um iraivan umakku alittirukkum vakkurutiyinpati enkalukkakap pirarttanai ceyviraka! Enkalai vittum iv vetanaiyai nir nikki vittal, niccayamaka nankal um'mitu nampikkai kontu isravelarkalai um'mutan melum niccayamaka anuppi vitukirom" enru kurinarkala
